      • createWriterFactory

        public FormatWriterFactory createWriterFactory(RowType type)
        The OrcWriterFactory will create ThreadLocalClassLoaderConfiguration from the input writer config to avoid classloader leaks.

        TODO: The ThreadLocalClassLoaderConfiguration in OrcWriterFactory should be removed after https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ORC-653 is fixed.

        Specified by:
        createWriterFactory in class FileFormat
        Parameters:
        type - The data type for the writer
        Returns:
        The factory of the writer
